languages.text: {n}Некоторое время вокс молчит.{/n} "Кажется, у вас нет выбора, если вы хотите помочь своим подданным. Хоть мне и не нравится то, что происходит, но я бы посоветовал отправиться во Дворец — как минимум чтобы узнать, что можно сделать для защиты людей".

{n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время вокс молчит.{/n} "Кажется, у вас нет выбора, если вы хотите помочь своим подданным. Хоть мне и не нравится то, что происходит, но я бы посоветовал отправиться во Дворец — как минимум чтобы узнать, что можно сделать для защиты людей".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

{n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advice you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, in order to find out what you can do to protect your people."

{n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

{n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

{n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

{n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

languages.text: {n}Das Vox schweigt eine Weile.{/n} "Anscheinend habt Ihr keine Wahl, wenn Ihr Euren Untertanen helfen wollt. Mir gefällt zwar nicht, was da vorgeht, aber ich würde Euch raten, zum Palast zugehen – wenn auch nur, um herauszufinden, was Ihr zum Schutz Eures Volkes tun könnt."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox schweigt eine Weile.{/n} "Anscheinend habt Ihr keine Wahl, wenn Ihr Euren Untertanen helfen wollt. Mir gefällt zwar nicht, was da vorgeht, aber ich würde Euch raten, zum Palast zugehen – wenn auch nur, um herauszufinden, was Ihr zum Schutz Eures Volkes tun könnt."

languages.text: {n}Le silence règne pendant plusieurs instants.{/n} « Si vous voulez aider vos sujets, vous n'avez pas le choix. La situation ne me plaît guère, mais je vous conseille tout de même de vous rendre au palais, ne serait-ce que pour déterminer comment protéger vos gens. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le silence règne pendant plusieurs instants.{/n} « Si vous voulez aider vos sujets, vous n'avez pas le choix. La situation ne me plaît guère, mais je vous conseille tout de même de vous rendre au palais, ne serait-ce que pour déterminer comment protéger vos gens. »

languages.text: {n}音阵频道沉默了半晌。{/n}“如果你想帮助你的臣民，恐怕别无选择。尽管当下发生的情况让我有种不好的预感，但我还是建议你去趟正义大殿。至少，你可以看看应该如何保护你的臣民。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵频道沉默了半晌。{/n}“如果你想帮助你的臣民，恐怕别无选择。尽管当下发生的情况让我有种不好的预感，但我还是建议你去趟正义大殿。至少，你可以看看应该如何保护你的臣民。”

languages.text: {n}El voco guarda silencio durante unos momentos.{/n} «Parece que no tiene elección si quiere ayudar a sus súbditos. Aunque no me gusta lo que oigo, le recomiendo que vaya al Palacio, aunque solo sea por saber qué puede hacer para proteger a los suyos».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco guarda silencio durante unos momentos.{/n} «Parece que no tiene elección si quiere ayudar a sus súbditos. Aunque no me gusta lo que oigo, le recomiendo que vaya al Palacio, aunque solo sea por saber qué puede hacer para proteger a los suyos».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスはしばらく沈黙した。{/n}「臣民を助けたいなら、あなたに選択の余地はないようです。事態は気に入りませんが、せめて何ができるかを知るためにも司法宮に行くことをお勧めします」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスはしばらく沈黙した。{/n}「臣民を助けたいなら、あなたに選択の余地はないようです。事態は気に入りませんが、せめて何ができるかを知るためにも司法宮に行くことをお勧めします」

languages.text: {n}Voks, bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Tebaanıza yardım etmek istiyorsanız başka seçeneğiniz yok gibi görünüyor. Olanlar hoşuma gitmese de Adalet Sarayı'na gitmenizi tavsiye ederim. En azından halkınızı korumak için neler yapabileceğinizi öğrenmiş olursunuz."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for a while.{/n} "It appears you have no choice if you want to help your subjects. Although I don't like what is going on, I would advise you to go to the Palace — if nothing else, to find out what you can do to protect your people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Tebaanıza yardım etmek istiyorsanız başka seçeneğiniz yok gibi görünüyor. Olanlar hoşuma gitmese de Adalet Sarayı'na gitmenizi tavsiye ederim. En azından halkınızı korumak için neler yapabileceğinizi öğrenmiş olursunuz."
